document_data.name: Slumber
document_data.mainbody: '''''Slumber''''' was a rare spell of the [[southern magic]] tradition.{{Southernmagic}}
document_data.Effects: The spell caused one or more creatures within 60 yards (54 meters) from the caster to fall into a deep, comatose sleep. All creatures needed to be within 50 feet (15 meters) of each other. The number of creatures affected was dependant on the caster's skill level. Weaker creatures were more susceptible to the spell than stronger creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], a pinch of dust.
